Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: Keri_Cadden Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: travelled friends possibly coldest weather amsterdam seen hotel location 10 minute walk train station approx 10 minutes red light district beds amazingly comfortable lot normal bed home staff friendly ready requested warm bathroom freezing plenty hot water helped warm visit irish bar hotel street station staff food reasonable priced food drink compared enjoy visit hotel reasonable location

Reviews.Title: “Great service, poor room.”
Reviews.Author: Greig M
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 201112 booked single upgraded nice receptionist double wouldve preferred single bed space tiny location hotel fantastic minutes walk central station breakfast standard continental european boring consistent tasty average fairly recent renovation cheaply overall decent hotel price dont expect doing sleeping oh dark lights lighting weak candle

Reviews.Title: “The smallest room in the world”
Reviews.Author: paris-eric
Reviews.Content: citadel hotel located heart amsterdam walking distance central station booked single price internet quiet night business amsterdam warned receptionist effort satisfy request allocated quiet nice view exact probably 10 square meter view central amsterdam strange feeling sleep attic people avoid ok breakfast huge variety choice enjoyed

Reviews.Title: “Could not fault this hotel”
Reviews.Author: geoff k
Reviews.Content: location central close staff helpful friendly moment arrived floor faced main road excessive noise twin bedded clean beds comfortable nice heating actually control enjoyed buffet breakfast choice food drinks found hotel stay else amsterdam recommend friends thank friendly staff stay enjoyable

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Hotel in Super Location”
Reviews.Author: RonGHaifa
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 7 nights hotel october front desk staff extremely helpful giving directions various tourist sights compared standards amsterdam beds comfortable bathroom featured shower tub combination double hotel busy street recommend lacking view nights totally quiet elevator convenient breakfast included rate adequate somewhat lacking variety screen tv wall aside bbc cnn fox news stations american tastes suggest electric pot preparing coffee tea able walk main sights museums hotel convenient location dam square central train station definitely stay recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great place for all”
Reviews.Author: topcoptiger
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 mates singles spent hours looking websites try decent hotel hotel condition refurbished roomy dont spend anytime notice ensuite flat screen wall free internet lobby pay wifi booked hotelscom breakfast included left luggage free secure storage entire day leave hotel 15 minutes foot train station 5 minutes hussle bussle shops red light district families couples solo thoroughly recommended
